stimulusHtml: Germany’s development of Blitzkrieg tactics for use in the Second World War is best explained in the context of

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of the Second World War.

choicesHtml: Nazi Germany’s alliance with the ideologically similar regime of Fascist Italy
German leaders’ desire to minimize the destruction of conquered territories
the greater size of Germany’s population relative to France, its main opponent in the First World War
Germany’s desire to avoid the stalemate of trench warfare that had typified the First World War
